inclusion.criterion: Female age 18 and older, not pregnant or lactating
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical T1 or T2 invasive cancer with no suspicious palpable adenopathy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If abnormal axillary nodes are seen on preoperative imaging, a negative fine needle aspiration or core biopsy is required for study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planned treatment with breast conserving surgery and whole breast irradiation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chemotherapy required postoperatively based on patient and tumor characteristics at diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with suspicious palpable axillary adenopathy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with biopsy demonstrating axillary nodal metastases
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of smoking and alcohol consumption, but no other significant medical conditions mentioned.
